meanings.definition: A colorless liquid used as a solvent.
meanings.sent1: The dioxane helped dissolve the paint easily.
meanings.sent2: Chemists often use dioxane as a solvent in their experiments.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat accidentally spilled dioxane all over the lab!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a dioxane, effortlessly blending ideas together.
meanings.sent5: The dioxane's ability to dissolve substances made it a valuable tool in the lab.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound with the formula C4H8O2.
meanings.sent1: The formula C4H8O2 represents the structure of dioxane.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the properties of dioxane to understand its behavior.
meanings.sent3: The students giggled when the teacher drew a smiley face using dioxane!
meanings.sent4: His love for music was like dioxane, a perfect blend of passion and rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The unique formula of C4H8O2 defines the composition of dioxane.
